img_above_text:
![Wukong Snowhill 11.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Wukong_Snowhill_11.jpg)
The Macaque Chief is fairly proficient with the giant curved blade he wields, and begins the fight by slamming it down to send a vacuum slice projectile right at you.
img_below_text:
He can also heave his blade around that will send his body spinning, attacking with two quick spinning slice attacks. Often times he'll end up holding the blade with his foot, and perform a final upward slash as he backflips, sending out another projectile slash.
![Wukong Snowhill 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/41/Wukong_Snowhill_12.jpg)

content.text:

            - Following Text: "He can also heave his blade around that will send his body spinning, attacking with two quick spinning slice attacks. Often times he'll end up holding the blade with his foot, and perform a final upward slash as he backflips, sending out another projectile slash.
![Wukong Snowhill 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/41/Wukong_Snowhill_12.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts a dynamic battle scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," featuring the Macaque Chief, a formidable enemy wielding a giant curved blade. The image captures the moment the Macaque Chief is executing a powerful attack, possibly a vacuum slice projectile, as part of his combat repertoire. The snowy environment adds to the intensity of the encounter, highlighting the game's action-packed narrative and the challenging nature of the fight against this skilled adversary.
